text: Heaven Can Wait is a 1978 American fantasy comedy movie co-directed by Warren Beatty and Buck Henry. It is about a young man (played by Beatty) being mistakenly taken to heaven by his guardian angel. The movie was nominated for nine Academy Awards. The cast includes Beatty, Julie Christie, and Jack Warden. ==References== Category:1970s fantasy movies Category:1978 comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies about angels Category:Movies about death Category:Movies about the afterlife Category:Movies about reincarnation Category:Movies set in country houses
title: Heaven Can Wait (1978 movie)
